name: Iron Rooftops
description:
IRON ROOFTOPS

Your one objective is to get the highest score. Rack up those points by traveling far across the rooftops, smashing into any enemies in your path.

The Grappling Hook is a very powerful tool in your arsenal! Use it to latch onto almost any solid object. When you latch on, you gain a push/pull towards that object  and you can fling yourself around, controlling your movement, even while zooming across the rooftops. Combining a double jump in the air and making the right adjustments is absolutely devastating for your enemies.

Proficiency with the Grappling Hook may make you the IRON ROOFTOP DOMINATOR.

WALKERS

--------------------------------

Walkers are dumb, but very angry enemies. They walk back and forth guarding their rooftop. If you try and smash into one from the side, then you will get poked and take damage. Instead, attack them from the top and you might just get off scot-free.

GHASTS

--------------------------------

Ghasts stay on their perch, guarding the skies and attacking anybody who gets near. They are weak and can easily be defeated with a quick and offensive attack before they can react. However, if you are too slow and let them set their target and charge up their beam, then  you will take damage. The perches that Ghasts sit on can be grappled onto and will not collide with you if you go through. Perches are great ways to get across the rooftops and combine jumps onto other enemies.

CREDIT:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic

HIGH SCORES

Share your High Score and it will be added!

DigitalScorpian49767
